channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 12:15 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 12:15 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow the following messages.#Poltava_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 10:13 Flashing anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 10:00 free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region.
